snippet: “Assyria to Iberia at the Dawn of the Classical Age,” at the Met, is a display of imperial might, and a roll call of states and kingdoms gone.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibit Assyria to Iberia at the Dawn of the Classical Age at Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: “Assyria to Iberia at the Dawn of the Classical Age,” at the Met, is a display of imperial might, and a roll call of states and kingdoms gone.

headline.seo: ‘Assyria to Iberia,’ at the Metropolitan Museum of Art
headline.main: In Empires’ Remnants, Wonders of Survival
headline.print_headline: In Empires’ Remnants, Wonders of Survival
